 Dolor sit amet

First of all, I\'m a computer geek.
I love exploring new things in the world of technology. I remember when Pascal became my first programming language during the national computer science Olympiad. I also learned about the c ++ programming language. This enthusiasm and persistence made me third in the Olympics.
My love for programming has led me to the next competition, which is the entrepreneurial competition in games. This is my first time getting to know a game engine called unity3d. At that time I made a virtual reality horror game with a simple mechanism.
This experience made me fall in love to dive deeper into the world of game development. Knowing that c # is the language used in unity3d, I got used to going through lines of code I mimicked on the internet to get used to it. With this habit, I learned what is called version control, because I often download projects via GitHub. Since then I have had the satisfaction of successfully completing the game system and I am very grateful to have found them all.
Do you like playing games? Are you also interested in making games? If so, feel free to discuss it with me, I will help you to make it come true
